mapper.select:
SELECT,su.user_name as create_user_name,sus.user_name as modified_user_name,bo.organization_name, (SELECT SUM(osrod.order_qty) FROM om_sales_return_order_det osrod where osrod.sales_return_order_id = osro.sales_return_order_id) as total_qty, (SELECT SUM(osrod.total_issue_qty) FROM om_sales_return_order_det osrod where osrod.sales_return_order_id = osro.sales_return_order_id) as total_issue_qty, (SELECT SUM(osrod.receiving_qty) FROM om_sales_return_order_det osrod where osrod.sales_return_order_id = osro.sales_return_order_id) as total_receiving_qty, (SELECT SUM(bmt.volume * osrod.order_qty) FROM om_sales_return_order_det osrod left join base_material_tab bmt on bmt.material_id = osrod.material_id where osrod.sales_return_order_id=osro.sales_return_order_id) as total_volume, (SELECT SUM(bmt.net_weight * osrod.order_qty) FROM om_sales_return_order_det osrod left join base_material_tab bmt on bmt.material_id = osrod.material_id where osrod.sales_return_order_id=osro.sales_return_order_id) as total_net_weight, (SELECT SUM(bmt.gross_weight * osrod.order_qty) FROM om_sales_return_order_det osrod left join base_material_tab bmt on bmt.material_id = osrod.material_id where osrod.sales_return_order_id=osro.sales_return_order_id) as total_gross_weight FROM om_sales_return_order osro left join sys_user su on osro.create_user_id = su.user_id left join sys_user sus on osro.modified_user_id = sus.user_id left join base_organization bo on osro.org_id = bo.organization_id
and osro.sales_return_order_code like CONCAT('%',#{salesReturnOrderCode},'%')
and osro.org_id = #{orgId}
and osro.order_status = #{orderStatus}
and date_format(osro.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(osro.complete_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{completeDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by osro.create_time desc

select IFNULL(bmb.volume,0) as total_volume,IFNULL(bmb.net_weight,0) as total_net_weight,IFNULL(bmb.gross_weight,0) as total_gross_weight From base_material bm left join base_material_tab bmb ON bm.material_id = bmb.material_id where bm.material_id = #{materialId}
